00039 #ifndef LGSS_UTILS_H
00040 #define LGSS_UTILS_H
00041 
00042 #include <inttypes.h>
00043 #include <stdlib.h>
00044 #include <stdint.h>
00045 #include <gssapi/gssapi.h>
00046 
00047 #define LGSS_SVC_MGS_STR        "lustre_mgs"
00048 #define LGSS_SVC_MDS_STR        "lustre_mds"
00049 #define LGSS_SVC_OSS_STR        "lustre_oss"
00050 #define LGSS_USR_ROOT_STR       "lustre_root"
00051 
00052 typedef enum {
00053         LGSS_SVC_MGS    = 0,
00054         LGSS_SVC_MDS    = 1,
00055         LGSS_SVC_OSS    = 2,
00056         LGSS_SVC_MAX
00057 } lgss_svc_t;
00058 
00059 extern const char *lgss_svc_str[LGSS_SVC_MAX];
00060 
00061 /****************************************
00062  * inter-process locking                *
00063  ****************************************/
00064 
00065 typedef enum {
00066         LGSS_MUTEX_KRB5         = 0,
00067         LGSS_MUTEX_MAX
00068 } lgss_mutex_id_t;
00069 
00070 int lgss_mutex_lock(lgss_mutex_id_t mid);
00071 int lgss_mutex_unlock(lgss_mutex_id_t mid);
00072 
00073 /****************************************
00074  * log facilities                       *
00075  ****************************************/
00076 
00077 /*
00078  * log level:
00079  * LL_ERR:      critical error messages
00080  * LL_WARN:     warning (default)
00081  * LL_INFO:     important infomation
00082  * LL_DEBUG:    debugging
00083  * LL_TRACE:    excessive tracing messages
00084  */
00085 typedef enum {
00086         LL_ERR          = 0,
00087         LL_WARN         = 1,
00088         LL_INFO         = 2,
00089         LL_DEBUG        = 3,
00090         LL_TRACE        = 4,
00091         LL_MAX
00092 } loglevel_t;
00093 
00094 extern loglevel_t g_log_level;
00095 
00096 void lgss_set_loglevel(loglevel_t level);
00097 
00098 void __logmsg(loglevel_t level, const char *func, const char *format, ...)
00099         __attribute__((format(printf, 3, 4)));
00100 
00101 void __logmsg_gss(loglevel_t level, const char *func, const gss_OID mech,
00102                   uint32_t major, uint32_t minor, const char *format, ...)
00103         __attribute__((format(printf, 6, 7)));
00104 
00105 #define logmsg(loglevel, format, args...)                               \
00106 do {                                                                    \
00107         if (loglevel <= g_log_level)                                    \
00108                 __logmsg(loglevel, __FUNCTION__, format, ##args);       \
00109 } while (0)
00110 
00111 #define logmsg_gss(loglevel, mech, major, minor, format, args...)       \
00112 do {                                                                    \
00113         if (loglevel <= g_log_level)                                    \
00114                 __logmsg_gss(loglevel, __FUNCTION__, mech,              \
00115                              major, minor, format, ##args);             \
00116 } while (0)
00117 
00118 #define lassert(exp)                                                    \
00119 do {                                                                    \
00120         if (!(exp)) {                                                   \
00121                 logmsg(LL_ERR, "ASSERTION FAILED: %s", #exp);           \
00122                 exit(-1);                                               \
00123         }                                                               \
00124 } while (0)
00125 
00126 /*
00127  * for compatible reason, we're using files (context_xxx.c) from nfs-utils
00128  */
00129 #define printerr(priority, format, args...)                             \
00130         logmsg(priority, format, ##args)
00131 
00132 #define pgsserr(msg, maj_stat, min_stat, mech)                          \
00133         logmsg_gss(LL_ERR, mech, maj_stat, min_stat, msg)
00134

00139 extern gss_OID_desc krb5oid;
00140 extern gss_OID_desc spkm3oid;
00141 
00142 typedef enum {
00143         LGSS_MECH_KRB5  = 0,
00144 } lgss_mech_t;
00145 
00146 /****************************************
00147  * client credentials                   *
00148  ****************************************/
00149 
00150 struct lgss_cred;
00151 
00152 struct lgss_mech_type {
00153         char               *lmt_name;
00154         lgss_mech_t         lmt_mech_n;
00155 
00156         int                (*lmt_init)(void);
00157         void               (*lmt_fini)(void);
00158         int                (*lmt_prepare_cred)(struct lgss_cred *cred);
00159         void               (*lmt_release_cred)(struct lgss_cred *cred);
00160         int                (*lmt_using_cred)(struct lgss_cred *cred);
00161 };
00162 
00163 enum {
00164         LGSS_ROOT_CRED_ROOT     = 0x01,
00165         LGSS_ROOT_CRED_MDT      = 0x02,
00166         LGSS_ROOT_CRED_OST      = 0x04,
00167 
00168         LGSS_ROOT_CRED_NR       = 3
00169 };
00170 
00171 struct lgss_cred {
00172         int                     lc_uid;
00173         unsigned int            lc_root_flags;
00174         uint64_t                lc_self_nid;
00175         uint64_t                lc_tgt_nid;
00176         uint32_t                lc_tgt_svc;
00177 
00178         struct lgss_mech_type  *lc_mech;
00179         void                   *lc_mech_cred;
00180 };
00181 
00182 struct lgss_mech_type *lgss_name2mech(const char *mech_name);
00183 int  lgss_mech_initialize(struct lgss_mech_type *mech);
00184 void lgss_mech_finalize(struct lgss_mech_type *mech);
00185 
00186 struct lgss_cred * lgss_create_cred(struct lgss_mech_type *mech);
00187 void lgss_destroy_cred(struct lgss_cred *cred);
00188 int lgss_prepare_cred(struct lgss_cred *cred);
00189 void lgss_release_cred(struct lgss_cred *cred);
00190 int lgss_using_cred(struct lgss_cred *cred);
00191 
00192 int lgss_get_service_str(char **string, uint32_t lsvc, uint64_t tgt_nid);

00194 
00195 extern gss_OID_desc krb5oid;
00196 extern gss_OID_desc spkm3oid;
00197 
00198 static inline
00199 int gss_OID_equal(gss_OID_desc *oid1, gss_OID_desc *oid2)
00200 {
00201         return (oid1->length == oid2->length &&
00202                 memcmp(oid1->elements, oid2->elements, oid1->length) == 0);
00203 }
00204 
00205 #ifndef g_OID_equal
00206 #define g_OID_equal(o1,o2)      gss_OID_equal((o1), (o2))
00207 #endif
00208 
00209 #endif /* LGSS_UTILS_H */
